title: FS: HOF's, Commons and Mid-Tier Backs

posts.post_title: FS: HOF's, Commons and Mid-Tier Backs
posts.post_content:
For sale are several HOF's, commons and Mid-Tier backs.  Pictures and prices are below for most of the raw cards.  Prices are for PayPal FF and does not include shipping (Please add 3% for PayPal goods).  Shipping is $2.67 no matter how many cards you purchase.  If interested, please send me a PM or contact me at [url]tbotticell@gmail.com[/url] for scans/pictures.  The backs are shown in order of the fronts.
